longBusinessSummary: Garware Hi-Tech Films Limited manufactures and sells polyester films in India and internationally. The company offers automotive window films comprising of infrared resistant, light reflective, non-reflective, and other window films. It also offers defendo, designer, privacy, decorative, exterior reflective, heat rejection, non-reflective, safety, security, and whiteboard films. In addition, the company provides lidding, liner, metallized, packaging, shrink pet, thermal, heat sealable, graphic, electrical, and electronics films, as well as offers paint protection films. Garware Hi-Tech Films Limited serves flexible packaging, lidding, shrink labels applications. The company was formerly known as Garware Polyester Limited and changed its name to Garware Hi-Tech Films Limited in April 2021. Garware Hi-Tech Films Limited was founded in 1933 and is based in Mumbai, India.
